Package com.library.frontend.controllers.operator

Class OperatorReadersController

java.lang.Object
com.library.frontend.controllers.operator.OperatorReadersController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class OperatorReadersController extends Object implements Controller
Controller class for the operator's management of readers. This controller handles operations related to readers, such as searching, displaying details, and managing book forms.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    javafx.scene.control.ListView<BookForm>
    bookFormListView
    ListView displaying book forms associated with the selected reader.
    javafx.scene.control.Button
    booksButton
    Button to navigate to the operator's book management scene.
    org.controlsfx.control.Rating
    readerRatingControl
    Rating control displaying and allowing interaction with the selected reader's rating.
    javafx.scene.control.TableView<Reader>
    readerTableView
    TableView displaying a list of readers.
    javafx.scene.control.TextField
    searchBarTextField
    TextField for entering the search query to find readers.
    javafx.scene.control.Button
    searchReaderButton
    Button to initiate the search for readers based on the entered query.
